alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Hennepin; Ramsey (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hennepin, north central Dakota and Ramsey Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Golden Valley, or near Minneapolis, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Minneapolis and Columbia Heights around 450 PM CDT. Roseville around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Paul, West St. Paul, Mendota Heights, Maplewood, Inver Grove Heights, South St. Paul and Woodbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for east central Minnesota.
